```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(sf) # for spatial data
library(tmap) # for interactive maps
```

```{r}
# Carbon Inventory
# dummy data for now - color coding by land type

ca_counties <- read_sf(here("data","ca_counties", "CA_Counties_TIGER2016.shp"))

ca_subset <- ca_counties %>% 
  select(NAME, ALAND) %>% 
  rename(county_name = NAME, land_area = ALAND)

# Set viewing mode to "interactive":
tmap_mode(mode = "view")

tm_shape(ca_subset) +
  tm_fill("land_area", palette = "Blues", title="Land area (sq meters)") +
  tm_borders(col = "white", lwd = 0.5) +
  tm_scale_bar()

```

```{r}
# Projection
# dummy dataset

matrix <- data.frame("year" = c(2016,2030),
                     "Acreage" = c(1, 1.3),
                     "Carbon" = c(2, 1.8),
                     "N2O" = c(3, 2.5)
                     )

ggplot(data = matrix) +
    geom_col(aes(x=year, y = N2O, fill = year))

```


```{r}
# Carbon-Smart Management Practices

matrix_mgmt <- matrix %>% 
  mutate("Composting" = c(0.5,0.5),
        "Cover Cropping" = c(1.5, 1.5),
       "Restoration" = c(5,5)) %>% 
mutate("new" = Composting*Acreage*(50/100))

ggplot(data = matrix_mgmt) +
  geom_col(aes(x=year, y = new))

```
